DOC.brief_summary: Foundations Health 12-week behavioral weight loss intervention primarily conduct via internet aim help overweight obese young adult ( age 18-30 ) lose weight increase physical activity , decrease energy density diet , increase consumption low energy dense self-made meal provide culinary training skill .
DOC.detailed_description: Young adulthood recognize key time focus health promotion/disease prevention , time young individual begin transition independence thus adopt health behavior carry later adulthood . Unfortunately , time period often marked decrease physical activity dietary quality . Working young adult establish first independent living situation help set foundation behavior may aid lifelong weight management chronic disease prevention . Foundations Health first study examine effect web-based lifestyle modification program combination culinary skill lifestyle skill train session weight loss , dietary intake , meal preparation behavior use reduced energy dense diet young adult family history diabetes . Foundations Health provide 12-week weight loss intervention overweight obese young adult , age 18 35 year . Study participant randomly assign one two condition : 1 ) web-based behavioral intervention decrease dietary energy density increase physical activity ; 2 ) intervention combine hands-on culinary skill train program design increase food purchase meal self-preparation consumption meal low energy density . The primary aim feasibility study : 1 ) determine web-based plus culinary training condition great increase food purchasing , meal preparation/cooking behavior , intake self-made meal ; great decrease consumption `` convenience meal '' web-based condition 3 month ; 2 ) determine web-based plus culinary training condition great decrease dietary energy density percent energy fat great increase fruit vegetable consumption web-based condition 3 month .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 35 year old . BMI 25 45 kg/m2 . Have type 2 diabetes adult family member , first second degree relative , type 2 diabetes . Have cook food preparation area , along cook utensil , available current living situation . Consume > 3 restaurant/fast food meals/week . Regular reliable internet access via computer . Report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) .20 Report able walk two block . Report major psychiatric disease organic brain syndrome . Are currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication lose > 5 % body weight past 6 month . Intend bariatric surgery within time frame investigation . Intend move outside metropolitan area within time frame investigation . Are pregnant , lactate , less 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant time frame investigation . Have percent body fat < 20 % female < 13 % male . Live adult responsible food purchase and/or meal preparation . Have purchase full meal plan college din service program . Do regular access transportation ( need food purchase ) . Do provide email contact information need access web base program . Report consume > 10 selfmade lunch dinner per week .
